SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id and ii.is_main = 1 left join (select item_id, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id) tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = ii.item_id
i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id and ii.is_main = 1 left join (select item_id, min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id) tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = ii.item_id
i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId}
i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'

tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

#{specId}
